title: Caped: The Burdens of Fate
description: After a compelling visit from a stranger from the future, Edward Otep's new life goal is simple: Ensure humanity survives! But he can't do it alone. With his team assembled, they fight a clock quickly counting down to zero. People worldwide are developing extraordinary abilities, with society as we know it crumbling down around them. It's up to Edward and his new friends to endure terrorists attack, crazy discoveries, catastrophes, and the possible end of humanity as we know it. These are the selfless acts that build character, make heroes, and create legends. But as the old adage goes, "No good deed goes unpunished."
author: Kerron Streater
